mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(listNum, userId, orderId, content, created , starScore, productNum, answer) VALUES (review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userId}, #{orderId}, #{content}, SYSDATE ,#{starScore}, #{productNum}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM review r JOIN member1 m ON r.userId = m.userId WHERE r.productNum = #{productNum}

SELECT r.productNum, r.listNum, m.userName, r.userId, content, starScore, created FROM review r JOIN member1 m ON r.userId = m.userId WHERE r.productNum = #{productNum} ORDER BY listNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, q.userId, m.userName, question, questionCreated, sellerId, answer, answerCreated FROM sellerQna q JOIN member1 m ON q.userId = m.userId WHERE productNum=#{productNum} ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sellerQna(num, productNum, userId, question, questionCreated, orderId) VALUES (sellerQna.NEXTVAL, #{productNum}, #{userId}, #{question}, #{questionCreated}, SYSDATE, #{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
